name: Twin Planets
description:
This little game was submitted to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 ("Stronger Together").

You play as a laser-shooting satellite in space. Try to place your laser beams so that the two planets are as close to each other as possible. The closer they are, the faster your energy bar is charged. It's not a puzzle, though, it's full of nerve-wrecking action.

Use the SPACE key or the left mouse button to place the lasers. It's all about the timing!

Your goal is to play through all 5 levels as quickly as possible. Compare your time to all the other players, there is a global High Score list in the game!
